name: desso-database
description: DESSO is a database that provides all identified sequence and shape motifs from a homonymous framework. This framework contains a deep learning model for motif pattern learning and a novel statistical model for motif instance identification. The DESSO database records 690 human ENCODE ChIP-seq datasets, 185 transcription factors datasets related to 20 cancer types, and 3 Single-cell ChIP-seq datasets.
author: Cankun Wang
